title: Ep 175 | Phil Says We're at a Tipping Point, the First Unashamed Wedding & Hate as a Badge of Honor
description:
There's one thing Phil appreciates about the internet. Al performs the first-ever Unashamed wedding ceremony. Zach and Al recall their sinful pasts, and Phil remembers Jep's house arrest. Phil is certain our culture is at a tipping point, and Al says there's only one way to fix it. And the guys talk about Jesus' testimony, getting your kids on the right path, wearing hate as a badge of honor, and being freed from the 3 Ps: the penalty of sin, the power of sin, and the presence of sin.
